doc.title: Hayat kavgasi
doc.plot: Murat works in a factory and looks after his sister Nil. Nil has a health problem with her heart. She starts going to the conservatory which many rich girls attend and there she meets Filiz. Filiz and Nil become good friends. Filiz takes Nil home one day and meets Murat. They feel attracted to each other. Filiz offers Nil money for the surgery, but Nil doesn't accept this offer. Filiz's stepbrother Recep envies the relationship between Filiz and Murat. One day as Murat buys some medicine for Nil, prevents Murat from taking his sister the medicine and as a result Nil dies. Filiz's stepmother also disapproves Filiz's relationship with Murat, yet the couple get married and have a girl named Funda. Funda starts going to school. One day, her grandfather accidentally hits her with his car and takes the girl to his home. When Filiz and Murat come, the whole truth is revealed. Osman sends his wife and son away from his house and starts living with his daughter, son-in-law and granddaughter.
